original: bsam gtan gang dang gang la snyoms par 'jug pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par @326b rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig /
analyzed: bsam gtan gang dang gang la snyoms par 'jug pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par @326b rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig /
translated: You should dedicate all your meditative concentrations to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: tshur rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: tshur rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of a good family,

original: shes rab gang dang gang sgom pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig /
analyzed: shes rab gang dang gang sgom pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig /
translated: you should dedicate all your cultivation of wisdom to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of a good family,

original: khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig /🔽tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig / tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: you should not imagine unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening as form.🔽You should not imagine it as feeling.

original: 'du shes su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: 'du shes su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: You should not imagine it as apperception.

original: 'du byed du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: 'du byed du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: You should not imagine it as volitional dispositions.

original: rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /🔽mig tu rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig / mig tu rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: You should not imagine it as consciousness.🔽You should not imagine it as the eyes.

original: rna bar rtog par ma byed cig /🔽snar rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: rna bar rtog par ma byed cig / snar rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: You should not imagine it as the ears.🔽You should not imagine it as the nose.

original: lcer rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: lcer rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: You should not imagine it as the tongue.

original: lus su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: lus su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: You should not imagine it as the body.

original: yid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: yid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: You should not imagine it as the mind.

original: gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceive of form.

original: sgrar rtog par ma byed cig /🔽drir rtog par ma byed cig /🔽ror rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: sgrar rtog par ma byed cig / drir rtog par ma byed cig / ror rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceive of sound.🔽Do not conceive of smell.🔽Do not conceive of taste.

original: reg tu rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: reg tu rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceive of touch.

original: chos su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: chos su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceive of mental objects.

original: mig gi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceive of eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /🔽sna'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig / sna'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceive of ear consciousness.🔽Do not conceive of nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceive of tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceive of body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceive of mental consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceive of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te  par rtog par ma byed cig /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te  par rtog par ma byed cig / sna'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceive of ear contact.🔽Do not conceive of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceive of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceive of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te @327a *//
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te @327a *//
translated: The mind is the basis for the arising of the mental afflictions.🔽

original: reg par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: reg par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize mental contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.🔽Do not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.🔽Do not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog bar ma byed cig /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog bar ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the feeling that arises from the condition of mental contact.

original: rigs kyi bu /🔽khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu / khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Son of noble family,🔽do not conceptualize the earth element as unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: chu'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: chu'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the water element as unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: me'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: me'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the fire element as unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rlung gi khams su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: rlung gi khams su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the wind element as unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: nam mkha'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig /🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig / rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the space element.🔽Do not conceptualize the consciousness element.

original: ma rig par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: ma rig par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize ignorance.

original: 'du byed du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: 'du byed du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize name and form.

original: skye mched drug tu rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: skye mched drug tu rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the six sense fields.

original: reg par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: reg par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize contact.

original: tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig /🔽sred par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig / sred par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize feeling.🔽Do not conceptualize craving.

original: len par rtog par ma byed cig /🔽srid par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: len par rtog par ma byed cig / srid par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize grasping.🔽Do not conceptualize becoming.

original: skye bar rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: skye bar rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize birth.

original: rga shir rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: rga shir rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize old age and death.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @327b pa'i byang chub sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @327b pa'i byang chub sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: do not conceptualize unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening as the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize it as the perfection of moral discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the perfection of wisdom.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of a good family,

original: khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nang stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nang stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: do not conceptualize unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening as the emptiness of inner phenomena.

original: phyi stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize it as the emptiness of outer phenomena.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize it as the emptiness of outer and inner phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize it as the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize it as the emptiness of great extent.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize it as the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽Do not conceptualize it as the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize it as the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽Do not conceptualize the emptiness of what is without beginning or end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽Do not conceptualize the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the emptiness of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /🔽dngos po med @328a *//
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig / dngos po med @328a *//
translated: Do not conceptualize the emptiness of essence.

original: pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the emptiness of the essence of non-entities.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: do not conceptualize unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening as the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize them as the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /🔽dbang po rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig / dbang po rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize them as the legs of miraculous power.🔽Do not conceptualize them as the faculties.

original: stobs rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: stobs rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize them as the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize them as the branches of enlightenment.

original: lam rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: lam rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize them as the path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize them as the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan bzhir rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhir rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize them as the four concentrations.

original: tshad med pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize them as the four immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize them as the four formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize them as the eight liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize them as the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize them as the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams su rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir @328b rtog par ma byed cig /🔽byams pa chen por rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir @328b rtog par ma byed cig / byams pa chen por rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽Do not conceptualize great love.

original: snying rje chen por rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: snying rje chen por rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the knowledge of the aspects of the path.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig /
translated: Do not conceptualize the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Uninvestigated form causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Uninvestigated feeling causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'du shes ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'du shes ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Uninvestigated perception causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'du byed ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'du byed ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Uninvestigated volitional factors cause the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i mig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i mig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Uninvestigated consciousness causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Uninvestigated eyes cause the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Uninvestigated ears cause the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i sna ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i sna ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The nose, which is not fully discriminated, causes the knowledge of all aspects to be gained.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i lce ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus ni rnam pa thams @329a *//
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i lce ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus ni rnam pa thams @329a *//
translated: The tongue, which is not fully discriminated, causes the knowledge of all aspects to be gained.

original: cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The body, which is not fully discriminated, causes the knowledge of all aspects to be gained.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid ni rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid ni rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The mind, which is not fully discriminated, causes the knowledge of all aspects to be gained.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Form, which is not fully discriminated, causes the knowledge of all aspects to be gained.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i sgra ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i dri ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i sgra ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i dri ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Sound, which is not fully discriminated, causes the knowledge of all aspects to be gained.🔽Smell, which is not fully discriminated, causes the knowledge of all aspects to be gained.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i ro ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i ro ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Taste, which is not fully discriminated, causes the knowledge of all aspects to be gained.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i reg ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i reg ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The contact that is not fully investigated leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i chos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i chos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The dharmas that are not fully investigated lead to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i sna'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i sna'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The eye consciousness that is not fully investigated leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.🔽The ear consciousness that is not fully investigated leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.🔽The nose consciousness that is not fully investigated leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i lce'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i lce'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The tongue consciousness that is not fully investigated leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The body consciousness that is not fully investigated leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rim pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs @329b su ma brtags pa'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rim pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs @329b su ma brtags pa'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The uninvestigated mental consciousness brings about the attainment of the knowledge of all modes.🔽The uninvestigated visual contact brings about the attainment of the knowledge of all modes.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The uninvestigated auditory contact brings about the attainment of the knowledge of all modes.🔽The uninvestigated olfactory contact brings about the attainment of the knowledge of all modes.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The uninvestigated gustatory contact brings about the attainment of the knowledge of all modes.🔽The uninvestigated tactile contact brings about the attainment of the knowledge of all modes.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The uninvestigated mental contact brings about the obtainment of the knowledge of all modes.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The uninvestigated feeling which arises from the condition of eye-contact brings about the obtainment of the knowledge of all modes.🔽The uninvestigated feeling which arises from the condition of ear-contact brings about the obtainment of the knowledge of all modes.🔽The uninvestigated feeling which arises from the condition of nose-contact brings about the obtainment of the knowledge of all modes.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The uninvestigated feeling which arises from the condition of tongue-contact brings about the obtainment of the knowledge of all modes.🔽The uninvestigated feeling which arises from the condition of body-contact brings about the obtainment of the knowledge of all modes.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of unanalyzed contact through the coming together of body and form causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa @330a *//
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa @330a *//
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of unanalyzed contact through the coming together of mind and mental phenomena

original: pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i sa'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i sa'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The unanalyzed earth element causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i chu'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i me'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i chu'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i me'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The unanalyzed water element causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The unanalyzed fire element causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rlung gi khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rlung gi khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The unanalyzed wind element causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i nam mkha'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do /
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i nam mkha'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do /
translated: The space element, when not fully investigated, leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The consciousness element, when not fully investigated, leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i ma rig pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i ma rig pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Ignorance, when not fully investigated, leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'du byed ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'du byed ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Formative activity, when not fully investigated, leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Consciousness, when not fully investigated, leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i ming dang gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i ming dang gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Name-and-form, when not fully investigated, leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i skye mched drug ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i skye mched drug ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The six sense fields, when not fully investigated, lead to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Contact that is not fully examined leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: @330b yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i sred pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: @330b yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i sred pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Sensation that is not fully examined leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.🔽Craving that is not fully examined leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i len pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i srid pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i len pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i srid pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Clinging that is not fully examined leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.🔽Becoming that is not fully examined leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i skye ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i skye ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Birth that is not fully examined leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rga shi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rga shi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Aging and death that are not fully examined lead to the attainment of the knowledge of all things.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The perfection of generosity that is not fully scrutinized leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The perfection of morality that is not fully scrutinized leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The perfection of patience that is not fully scrutinized leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The perfection of perseverance that is not fully scrutinized leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The perfection of concentration that is not fully scrutinized leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom that is not fully scrutinized leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i nang stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i nang stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The emptiness of the inner, not fully investigated, causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs @331a *// su ma brtags pa'i phyi stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i phyi nang stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs @331a *// su ma brtags pa'i phyi stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i phyi nang stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The emptiness of the outer, not fully investigated, causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The emptiness of the outer and inner, not fully investigated, causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su mi brtags pa'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su mi brtags pa'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness, not fully investigated, causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i chen po stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i chen po stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The emptiness of great extent, not fully investigated, causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality, not fully investigated, causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena that is not fully discriminated brings about the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i thob ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i thob ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena that is not fully discriminated brings about the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The emptiness of the transcendence of extremes that is not fully discriminated brings about the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The emptiness of the endless and beginningless that is not fully discriminated brings about the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The emptiness of non-rejection that is not fully discriminated brings about the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic nature that is not fully discriminated brings about the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @331b pa nyid thob par byad do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @331b pa nyid thob par byad do //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena that are not fully discriminated is what causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The emptiness of the intrinsic identity of all phenomena that are not fully discriminated is what causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The emptiness of nonapprehension of all phenomena that are not fully discriminated is what causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The emptiness of things that are not fully discriminated is what causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The emptiness of intrinsic nature of all phenomena that are not fully discriminated is what causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The emptiness of the intrinsic nature of nonthings of all phenomena that are not fully discriminated is what causes the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The applications of mindfulness that are not fully investigated cause the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The right efforts that are not fully investigated cause the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i dbang po rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i dbang po rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The legs of miraculous power that are not fully investigated cause the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The faculties that are not fully investigated cause the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i stobs rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i stobs rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The powers that are not fully investigated cause the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The limbs of awakening that are not fully investigated cause the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rnam pa thams @332a *//🔽cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rnam pa thams @332a *// cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The noble eightfold path, when not fully investigated, leads to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The noble truths, when not fully investigated, lead to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i bsam gtan rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i bsam gtan rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The concentrations, when not fully investigated, lead to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshad med pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshad med pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The immeasurables, when not fully investigated, lead to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The formless absorptions, when not fully investigated, lead to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par thar pa brgyad ni rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par thar pa brgyad ni rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The eight deliverances, when not fully investigated, lead to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: the formless absorptions that are not fully discriminated are what cause the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are doors to liberation and are not fully discriminated are what cause the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: the clairvoyances that are not fully discriminated are what cause the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: the meditative stabilities that are not fully discriminated are what cause the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways that are not fully discriminated are what cause the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i @332b stobs bcu ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i @332b stobs bcu ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The ten powers of the Tathagata, when not fully investigated, lead to the attainment of the knowledge of all modes.🔽The four grounds of self-confidence, when not fully investigated, lead to the attainment of the knowledge of all modes.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //🔽yongs su ma brtags pa'i byams pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do // yongs su ma brtags pa'i byams pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The four analytical knowledges, when not fully investigated, lead to the attainment of the knowledge of all modes.🔽The great friendliness, when not fully investigated, leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all modes.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The great compassion, when not fully investigated, leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all modes.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The eighteen special Buddhadharmas, when not fully investigated, lead to the attainment of the knowledge of all modes.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i thams cad shes pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i thams cad shes pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The knowledge of all things without thorough analysis leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: yongs su ma brtags pa'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su ma brtags pa'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: The knowledge of the aspects of the path without thorough analysis leads to the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: mig gi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mig gi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mig gi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of the eye is the non-cessation of the eye.

analyzed: mig gi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mig gi 'dre ba med pa'o // rna ba'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the eye is the non-defilement of the eye.🔽The non-defilement of the eye is the non-purification of the eye.🔽The non-connection of the ear is the non-arising of the ear.

original: rna ba'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i skye ba med pa'o //

analyzed: sna'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dre ba med pa'o //

original: lce'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'brel pa med pa'o //

original: lce'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i skye ba med pa'o //

original: lce'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'gag pa med pa'o //

analyzed: lce'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dre ba med pa'o //

original: lus kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //

analyzed: lus kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //

original: lus kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽yid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dre ba med pa'o // yid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-ceasing of the body is the absence of contact of the body.🔽The absence of contact of the mind is the absence of connection of the mind.

original: yid kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi skye ba med pa'o //

original: yid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //

original: yid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //

original: gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //

original: gzugs kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de na gzugs kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de na gzugs kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of form is the non-arising of form.

original: gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa @342b de ni gzugs kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa @342b de ni gzugs kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of form is the unceasing form.

original: gzugs kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The unceasing form is the non-mixing of form.

original: sgra'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sgra'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: sgra'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sgra'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-mixing of sound is the non-connection of sound.

original: sgra'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sgra'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: sgra'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sgra'i skye ba med pa'o //

original: sgra'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sgra'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: sgra'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sgra'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of sound is the unceasing sound.

analyzed: sgra'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sgra'i 'dre ba med pa'o //

original: dri'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dri'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dri'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dri'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The absence of a connection with smell is the absence of a connection with smell.

original: dri'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dri'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: dri'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dri'i skye ba med pa'o //

original: dri'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dri'i 'gag pa med pa'o //🔽dri'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dri'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: dri'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dri'i 'gag pa med pa'o // dri'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dri'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of smell is the non-cessation of smell.🔽The non-cessation of smell is the absence of a connection with smell.

original: ro'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ro'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: ro'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ro'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The absence of a connection with taste is the absence of a connection with taste.

original: ro'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ro'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: ro'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ro'i skye ba med pa'o //

original: ro'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ro'i 'gag pa med pa pa'o //
analyzed: ro'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ro'i 'gag pa med pa pa'o //

analyzed: ro'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni ro'i 'dre ba med pa'o // reg gi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni reg gi 'brel pa med pa'o //

translated: The non-stopping of phenomena is the non-mixing of phenomena.🔽The non-mixing of eye consciousness is the non-connection of eye consciousness.

analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa'o //

analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //

translated: The non-permanence of eye consciousness is the non-appropriation of eye consciousness.🔽The non-appropriation of eye consciousness is the non-relinquishment of eye consciousness.🔽The non-relinquishment of eye consciousness is the non-attainment of eye consciousness.🔽The non-attainment of eye consciousness is the non-visualization of eye consciousness.🔽The non-visualization of eye consciousness is the non-manifestation of eye consciousness.🔽The non-manifestation of eye consciousness is the non-perception of eye consciousness.🔽The non-perception of eye consciousness is the non-existence of eye consciousness.🔽The non-existence of eye consciousness is the non-appearance of eye consciousness.🔽The non-appearance of eye consciousness is the non-vanishing of eye consciousness.

analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-vanishing of eye consciousness is the non-arising of eye consciousness.🔽The non-arising of eye consciousness is the non-cessation of eye consciousness.🔽The non-cessation of eye consciousness is the non-attachment of eye consciousness.🔽The non-attachment of eye consciousness is the non-bondage of eye consciousness.🔽The non-bondage of eye consciousness is the non-liberation of eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-liberation of eye consciousness is the non-defilement of eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-defilement of eye consciousness is the non-purification of eye consciousness.🔽The non-purification of eye consciousness is the non-production of eye consciousness.🔽The non-production of eye consciousness is

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with the nose consciousness is the absence of connection with the nose consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with the nose consciousness is the non-arising of the nose consciousness.

translated: The non-arising of the nose consciousness is the non-cessation of the nose consciousness.🔽The non-cessation of the nose consciousness is the absence of connection with the nose consciousness.

analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with the tongue consciousness is the absence of connection with the tongue consciousness.

translated: The absence of connection with the tongue consciousness is the non-arising of the tongue consciousness.

analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //

analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the body consciousness is the non-attachment of the body consciousness.

translated: The absence of connection with the mental consciousness is the absence of connection with the mental consciousness.
