original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'dre ba med pa'o // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-separation of the body’s contact in relation to the experience of touch is the non-conjoining of the body’s contact in relation to the experience of touch.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i skye ba med pa'o //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i skye ba med pa'o //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-conjoining of the body’s contact in relation to the experience of touch is the non-arising of the body’s contact in relation to the experience of touch.🔽The non-arising of the body’s contact in relation to the experience of touch is the non-cessation of the body’s contact in relation to the experience of touch.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is mentally compounded is the non-connection of the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is mentally compounded.

original: sa'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the earth element is the non-connection of the earth element.

original: sa'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the earth element is the non-arising of the earth element.

original: sa'i khams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of the earth element is the non-cessation of the earth element.

original: sa'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽chu'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams kyi 'brel ba @346b med pa'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o // chu'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams kyi 'brel ba @346b med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the earth element is the non-connection of the earth element.🔽The non-connection of the water element is the non-connection of the water element.

original: chu'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the water element is the non-arising of the water element.

original: chu'i khams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the water element is the non-birth of the water element.

original: chu'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽me'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni me'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //🔽me'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni me'i khams kyi skye ba med pa'o //🔽me'i khams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni me'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o // me'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni me'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa'o // me'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni me'i khams kyi skye ba med pa'o // me'i khams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni me'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-birth of the water element is the non-cessation of the water element.🔽The non-birth of the fire element is the non-cessation of the fire element.

original: me'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni me'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽rlung gi khams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni me'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o // rlung gi khams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the fire element is the non-birth of the fire element.🔽The non-birth of the wind element is the non-cessation of the wind element.

original: rlung gi khams kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the wind element is the non-birth of the wind element.🔽The non-birth of the space element is the non-cessation of the space element.🔽The non-cessation of the space element is the non-birth of the space element.

original: rlung gi khams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the wind element is the non-cessation of the wind element.🔽The non-cessation of the wind element is the non-attachment of the wind element.🔽The non-attachment of the wind element is the non-bondage of the wind element.

original: rlung gi khams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-bondage of the wind element is the non-liberation of the wind element.🔽The non-production of the space element is the non-cessation of the space element.🔽The non-cessation of the space element is the non-attachment of the space element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //🔽nam mkha'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa'o // nam mkha'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-attachment of the space element is the non-bondage of the space element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //🔽nam mkha'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i @347a *//🔽khams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o // nam mkha'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i @347a *// khams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-bondage of the space element is the non-liberation of the space element.🔽The non-production of the consciousness element is the non-cessation of the consciousness element.🔽The non-cessation of the consciousness element is the non-attachment of the consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-attachment of the consciousness element is the non-bondage of the consciousness element.🔽The non-bondage of the consciousness element is the non-liberation of the consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the consciousness element is the non-production of the consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the consciousness element is the non-cessation of the consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o /
translated: The non-cessation of the consciousness element is the non-confusion of the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-confusion of ignorance is the non-connection of ignorance.

original: ma rig pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of ignorance is the non-production of ignorance.

original: ma rig pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of ignorance is the non-cessation of ignorance.

original: ma rig pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of ignorance is the non-confusion of ignorance.

original: 'du byed kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection of formations is the absence of connection of formations.

original: 'du byed kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection of formations is the non-arising of formations.

original: 'du byed kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of formations is the non-ceasing of formations.

original: 'du byed kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-ceasing of formations is the absence of connection of formations.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection of consciousness is the absence of connection of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang @347b yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang @347b yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection of consciousness is the non-arising of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of consciousness is the non-ceasing of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-ceasing of consciousness is the absence of connection of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ming dang gzugs kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ming dang gzugs kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of a connection between name and form is the absence of a connection between name and form.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ming dang gzugs kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ming dang gzugs kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of a connection between name and form is the non-arising of name and form.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ming dang gzugs kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ming dang gzugs kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of name and form is the non-cessation of name and form.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni ming dang gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽skye mched drug gi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug gi 'brel ba med pa'o //🔽skye mched drug gi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug gi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni ming dang gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa'o // skye mched drug gi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug gi 'brel ba med pa'o // skye mched drug gi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug gi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of name and form is the absence of a connection between name and form.🔽The absence of a connection between the six sense sources is the absence of a connection between the six sense sources.🔽The absence of a connection between the six sense sources is the non-arising of the six sense sources.

original: skye mched drug gi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug gi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug gi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of the six sense sources is the non-cessation of the six sense sources.

original: skye mched drug gi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug gi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug gi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the six sense-spheres is the non-mixing of the six sense-spheres.

original: reg pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-mixing of contact is the non-connection of contact.

original: reg pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of contact is the non-arising of contact.

original: reg pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of contact is the non-cessation of contact.

original: reg pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of contact is the non-mixing of contact.

original: tshor ba'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba'i 'brel ba med pa'o //🔽tshor ba'i @348a *//
analyzed: tshor ba'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba'i 'brel ba med pa'o // tshor ba'i @348a *//
translated: The non-mixing of feeling is the non-connection of feeling.

original: 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of feeling is the non-arising of feeling.

original: tshor ba'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of feeling is the non-cessation of feeling.

original: tshor ba'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of feeling is the non-mixing of feeling.

original: sred pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of the connection of craving is the absence of the connection of craving.

original: sred pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of the connection of craving is the non-arising of craving.

original: sred pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of craving is the non-cessation of craving.

original: sred pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of craving is the absence of the connection of craving.

original: len pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni len pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: len pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni len pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of the connection of grasping is the absence of the connection of grasping.

original: len pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni len pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: len pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni len pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of the connection of grasping is the non-arising of grasping.

original: len pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni len pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: len pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni len pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of grasping is the non-cessation of grasping.

original: len pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni len pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: len pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni len pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of grasping is the absence of the connection of grasping.

original: srid pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of the connection of becoming is the absence of the connection of becoming.

original: srid pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with existence is the non-arising of existence.

original: srid pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of existence is the non-cessation of existence.

original: srid pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of existence is the non-mixing of existence.

original: skye ba'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-mixing of birth is the non-connection of birth.

original: skye ba'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba'i skye ba med pa'o //🔽skye ba'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba'i skye ba med pa'o // skye ba'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of birth is the non-arising of birth.🔽The non-arising of birth is the non-cessation of birth.

original: skye ba'i @348b 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba'i 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽rga shi'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i @348b 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba'i 'dre ba med pa'o // rga shi'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of birth is the non-mixing of birth.🔽The non-mixing of old age and death is the non-connection of old age and death.

original: rga shi'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rga shi'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of old age and death is the non-arising of old age and death.

original: rga shi'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rga shi'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of old age and death is the non-stopping of old age and death.

original: rga shi'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rga shi'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-stopping of old age and death is the non-attachment of old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-attachment of the perfection of giving is the non-connection of the perfection of giving.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the perfection of giving is the non-production of the perfection of giving.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the perfection of giving is the non-stopping of the perfection of giving.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-stopping of the perfection of giving is the non-attachment of the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with the perfection of morality is the absence of connection with the perfection of morality.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with the perfection of morality is the non-production of the perfection of morality.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the perfection of morality is the non-cessation of the perfection of morality.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin @349a *//
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin @349a *//
translated: The non-cessation of the perfection of morality is the absence of connection with the perfection of morality.

original: pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with the perfection of patience is the absence of connection with the perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the perfection of patience is the non-production of the perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the perfection of patience is the non-cessation of the perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the perfection of patience is the non-conjoining of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-conjoining of the perfection of patience is the non-connection of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the perfection of patience is the non-production of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the perfection of perseverance is the non-cessation of the perfection of perseverance.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the perfection of perseverance is the non-mixing of the perfection of perseverance.🔽The non-mixing of the perfection of concentration is the non-attachment of the perfection of concentration.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-attachment of the perfection of concentration is the non-bondage of the perfection of concentration.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-bondage of the perfection of concentration is the non-production of the perfection of concentration.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa @349b med pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa @349b med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the perfection of concentration is the non-cessation of the perfection of concentration.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-existence of the cessation of the perfection of concentration is the non-mixing of the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-mixing of the perfection of wisdom is the non-connection of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the perfection of wisdom is the non-arising of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of the perfection of wisdom is the non-cessation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the perfection of wisdom is the non-mixing of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of inner emptiness is the non-mixing of inner emptiness.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of inner emptiness is the non-production of inner emptiness.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of inner emptiness is the non-cessation of inner emptiness.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of inner emptiness is the non-mixing of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-mixing of outer emptiness is the non-connection of outer emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of outer emptiness is the non-production of outer emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of outer emptiness is the non-cessation of outer emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽phyi nang @350a *//
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o // phyi nang @350a *//
translated: The non-ceasing of external emptiness is the non-mixing of external emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-mixing of internal and external emptiness is the non-connection of internal and external emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of internal and external emptiness is the non-arising of internal and external emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of internal and external emptiness is the non-ceasing of internal and external emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-ceasing of internal and external emptiness is the non-mixing of internal and external emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-mixing of the emptiness of emptiness is the non-connection of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection that is the emptiness of emptiness is the non-production of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production that is the emptiness of emptiness is the non-cessation of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation that is the emptiness of emptiness is the non-affliction of the emptiness of emptiness.🔽The non-affliction that is the emptiness of emptiness is the non-purity of the emptiness of emptiness.🔽The non-purity that is the emptiness of emptiness is the emptiness of great emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of great emptiness is the non-connection of the emptiness of great emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection that is the emptiness of great emptiness is the non-production of the emptiness of great emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production that is the emptiness of great emptiness is the non-cessation of the emptiness of great emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-duality of the emptiness of great things is the non-separation of the emptiness of great things.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel @350b ba med pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel @350b ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-duality of the emptiness of ultimate reality is the non-separation of the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-duality of the emptiness of ultimate reality is the non-production of the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-duality of the non-production of the emptiness of ultimate reality is the non-cessation of the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-duality of the non-cessation of the emptiness of ultimate reality is the non-separation of the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-duality of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is the non-separation of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection that is the emptiness of the conditioned is the non-production of the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production that is the emptiness of the conditioned is the non-cessation of the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation that is the emptiness of the conditioned is the non-affliction of the emptiness of the conditioned.🔽The non-affliction that is the emptiness of the conditioned is the non-purity of the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-purity that is the emptiness of the conditioned is the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is the non-production of the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-apprehension of the emptiness of the unconditioned is the non-apprehension of the unconditioned.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of the ultimate is the non-apprehension of the ultimate.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of the compounded is the non-apprehension of the compounded.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of the uncompounded is the non-apprehension of the uncompounded.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is the non-apprehension of what is beyond extremes.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of the unlimited is the non-apprehension of the unlimited.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med @351a *//🔽pa'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med @351a *// pa'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-apprehension of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is the non-apprehension of that which has neither beginning nor end.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-apprehension of the emptiness of the primordial nature is the non-apprehension of the primordial nature.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of all things is the non-apprehension of all things.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of defining characteristics is the non-apprehension of defining characteristics.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of the non-apprehension is the non-apprehension of the non-apprehension.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of the essential nature is the non-apprehension of the essential nature.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of the inalienable is the non-apprehension of the inalienable.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of the ultimate is the non-apprehension of the ultimate.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of the conditioned is the non-apprehension of the conditioned.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of the unconditioned is the non-apprehension of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-apprehension of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is the non-apprehension of what is beyond extremes.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of the unlimited is the non-apprehension of the unlimited.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is the non-apprehension of that which has neither beginning nor end.🔽The non-apprehension of the emptiness of the primordial nature is the non-apprehension of the primordial nature

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the emptiness that is not of the nature of connection is the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the emptiness that is not of the nature of connection is the non-production of the emptiness that is not of the nature of connection.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the emptiness that is not of the nature of connection is the non-stopping of the emptiness that is not of the nature of connection.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-stopping of the emptiness that is not of the nature of connection is the non-defilement and non-purity of the emptiness that is not of the nature of connection.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-defilement and non-purity of the emptiness that is not of the nature of connection is the non-appearance of the emptiness that is not of the nature of connection.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of a relationship that is the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is the non-production of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is the non-cessation of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: @351b dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: @351b dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is the non-separation of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-separation of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is the absence of a relationship that is the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of a relationship that is the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is the non-production of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.🔽The non-production of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is the non-cessation of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is the non-separation of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-blockage that is the emptiness of nature is the non-mixing that is the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-mixing that is the emptiness of all phenomena is the non-agitation that is the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection that is the emptiness of all phenomena is the non-arising that is the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising that is the emptiness of all phenomena is the non-blockage that is the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-blockage that is the emptiness of all phenomena is the non-mixing that is the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with the emptiness of defining characteristics is the absence of connection with the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa @352a *//🔽gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa @352a *// gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with the emptiness of defining characteristics is the non-arising of the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of the emptiness of defining characteristics is the non-ceasing of the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽The non-ceasing of the emptiness of defining characteristics is the absence of connection with the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with the emptiness of non-apprehension is the absence of connection with the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of a causal relationship in the emptiness of non-apprehension is the non-production of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the emptiness of non-apprehension is the non-cessation of the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The non-cessation of the emptiness of non-apprehension is the non-conjoining of the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The non-conjoining of the emptiness of non-apprehension is the non-separation of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-separation of the emptiness of non-apprehension is the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence is the emptiness of other.🔽The emptiness of other is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of non-existence.🔽The emptiness of non-existence is the emptiness of intrinsic nature.🔽The emptiness of intrinsic nature is the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is the emptiness of inherent nature.🔽The emptiness of inherent nature is the emptiness of other.🔽The emptiness of other is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of non-existence.🔽The emptiness of non-existence is the emptiness of intrinsic nature.🔽The emptiness of intrinsic nature is the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is the emptiness of inherent nature.🔽The emptiness of inherent nature is the emptiness of other.🔽The emptiness of other is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of non-existence.🔽The emptiness of non-existence is the emptiness of intrinsic nature.🔽The emptiness of intrinsic nature is the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is the emptiness of inherent nature.🔽The emptiness of inherent nature is the emptiness of other.🔽The emptiness of other is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of non-existence.🔽The emptiness of non-existence is the emptiness of intrinsic nature.🔽The emptiness of intrinsic nature is the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is the emptiness of inherent nature.🔽The emptiness of inherent nature is the emptiness of other.🔽The emptiness of other is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of the emptiness of non-existent things is the non-ceasing of the emptiness of non-existent things.🔽The non-ceasing of the emptiness of non-existent things is the non-separation of the emptiness of non-existent things.🔽The non-separation of the emptiness of non-existent things is the non-attachment of the emptiness of non-existent things.🔽The non-attachment of the emptiness of non-existent things is the non-bondage of the emptiness of non-existent things.🔽The non-bondage of the emptiness of non-existent things is the non-liberation of the emptiness of non-existent things.🔽The non-liberation of the emptiness of non-existent things is the non-annihilation of the emptiness of non-existent things.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-annihilation of the emptiness of non-existent things is the non-existence of the emptiness of non-existent things.🔽The non-existence of the emptiness of non-existent things is the non-appearance of the emptiness of non-existent things.🔽The non-appearance of the emptiness of non-existent things is the non-destruction of the emptiness of non-existent things.🔽The non-destruction of the emptiness of non-existent things is the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence is the inherent existence of emptiness.🔽The inherent existence of emptiness is the emptiness of other.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa @352b de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa @352b de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of other is the other of emptiness.🔽The other of emptiness is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is the emptiness of all

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'o // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with the emptiness that is the non-existence of things is the absence of connection with the emptiness that is the non-existence of things.🔽The absence of connection with the emptiness that is the non-existence of things is the non-production of the emptiness that is the non-existence of things.🔽The non-production of the emptiness that is the non-existence of things is the non-cessation of the emptiness that is the non-existence of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the emptiness that is the non-existence of things is the absence of connection with the emptiness that is the non-existence of things.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the applications of mindfulness is the non-connection of the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dran ba nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dran ba nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the applications of mindfulness is the non-production of the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the applications of mindfulness is the non-cessation of the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag parnams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'dre ba @353a *//
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag parnams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o // yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'dre ba @353a *//
translated: The non-cessation of the applications of mindfulness is the non-connection of the applications of mindfulness.

original: med pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: med pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the right efforts is the non-connection of the right efforts.🔽The non-connection of the right efforts is the non-production of the right efforts.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o //🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o // yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The lack of connection of the right efforts is not the right efforts.🔽The lack of origination of the right efforts is not the right efforts.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The lack of cessation of the right efforts is not the right efforts.🔽The lack of connection of the legs of manifestation is not the legs of manifestation.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The lack of origination of the legs of manifestation is not the legs of manifestation.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the bases of supernatural power is not the non-cessation of the bases of supernatural power.

original: dbang po rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //

translated: The non-isolation of the bases of supernatural power is not the non-production of the bases of supernatural power.🔽The non-production of the bases of supernatural power is not the non-cessation of the bases of supernatural power.🔽The non-cessation of the bases of supernatural power is not the non-isolation of the bases of supernatural power.🔽The non-isolation of the bases of supernatural power is not the non-production of the bases of supernatural power.

analyzed: stobs rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni stobs rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the powers is the non-cessation of the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-conjoining of the limbs of awakening is the non-connection of the limbs of awakening.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the limbs of awakening is the non-production of the limbs of awakening.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the limbs of awakening is the non-cessation of the limbs of awakening.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'dre pa med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'dre pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-attachment of the limbs of enlightenment is the non-attachment of the limbs of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'brel pa med pa'o //🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i skye ba med pa'o //

translated: The non-connection of the noble eightfold path is the non-connection of the noble eightfold path.🔽The non-production of the noble eightfold path is the non-production of the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'gag pa @354a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'gag pa @354a *//
translated: The non-stopping of the noble eightfold path is the non-stopping of the noble eightfold path.

original: med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-attachment of the noble eightfold path is the non-attachment of the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i 'brel ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-mixing of the four noble truths is their non-connection.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the four noble truths is their non-production.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa'o //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa'o // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the four noble truths is their non-stopping.🔽The non-stopping of the four noble truths is their non-mixing.

original: bsam gtan bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa'o //🔽bsam gtan bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa'o // bsam gtan bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-mixing of the four noble truths is their non-connection.🔽The non-connection of the four noble truths is their non-production.

original: bsam gtan bzhi'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the four noble truths is their non-stopping.

original: bsam gtan bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa yin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa yin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the four concentrations is the non-mixing of the four concentrations.

original: tshad med pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-mixing of the four immeasurables is the non-connection of the four immeasurables.

original: tshad med pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the four immeasurables is the non-arising of the four immeasurables.

original: tshad med pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa'o /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa'o /
translated: The non-arising of the four immeasurables is the non-cessation of the four immeasurables.

original: tshad med pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa @354b gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa @354b gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the four immeasurables is the non-mixing of the four immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-mixing of the four formless concentrations is the non-connection of the four formless concentrations.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa'o //🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa'o // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the four formless concentrations is the non-production of the four formless concentrations.🔽The non-production of the four formless concentrations is the non-cessation of the four formless concentrations.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa'o // rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the four formless concentrations is the non-confusion of the four formless concentrations.🔽The non-confusion of the eight liberations is the non-connection of the eight liberations.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the eight liberations is the non-production of the eight liberations.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of the eight liberations is the non-ceasing of the eight liberations.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-ceasing of the eight liberations is the non-separation of the eight liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'brel pa med pa'o //🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms @355a *//🔽par 'jug pa dgu'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'brel pa med pa'o // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms @355a *// par 'jug pa dgu'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i skye ba med pa'o //
