translated: The non-separation of the nine serial absorptions is the non-connection of the nine serial absorptions.🔽The non-connection of the nine serial absorptions is the non-arising of the nine serial absorptions.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of the nine serial absorptions is the non-ceasing of the nine serial absorptions.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'dre ba med pa'o // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-existence of the cessation of the nine serial absorptions is the non-mixing of the nine serial absorptions.🔽The non-mixing of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation is the non-connection of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation is the non-production of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa @355b nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'gag pa med pa'o // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa @355b nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'dre ba med pa'o // mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation is the non-cessation of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation is the non-confusion of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.🔽The non-confusion of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation is the non-connection of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.🔽The non-connection of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation is the non-arising of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.🔽The non-arising of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation is the non-cessation of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the superknowledges is not the superknowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the superknowledges is not the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa'o // ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o // ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the concentrations is not the concentrations.🔽The non-production of the concentrations is not the concentrations.🔽The non-cessation of the concentrations is not the concentrations.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the liberations is not the liberations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the dhāraṇī gateways is the absence of confusion regarding the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the dhāraṇī gateways is the non-production of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the dhāraṇī gateways is the non-cessation of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'dre ba med @356a *//🔽pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'dre ba med @356a *// pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the dhāraṇī gateways is the non-defilement of the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽The non-connection of the ten powers of the tathāgatas is the non-production of the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the ten powers of the tathāgatas is the non-cessation of the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the ten powers of the Tathāgata is the non-birth of the ten powers of the Tathāgata.🔽The non-birth of the ten powers of the Tathāgata is the non-cessation of the ten powers of the Tathāgata.🔽The non-mixing of the ten powers of the Tathāgata is the non-birth of the ten powers of the Tathāgata.🔽The non-birth of the ten powers of the Tathāgata is the non-cessation of the ten powers of the Tathāgata.🔽The non-cessation of the ten powers of the Tathāgata is the non-mixing of the ten powers of the Tathāgata.🔽The non-mixing of the ten powers of the Tathāgata is the non-birth of the ten powers of the Tathāgata.🔽The non-birth of the ten powers of the Tathāgata is the non-cessation of the ten powers of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the ten powers of the Tathāgata is the non-mixing of the ten powers of the Tathāgata.🔽The non-mixing of the ten powers of the Tathāgata is the non-birth of the four fearlessnesses.🔽The non-birth of the four fearlessnesses is the non-cessation of the four fearlessnesses.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the four fearlessnesses is the non-mixing of the four fearlessnesses.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-mixing of the four fearlessnesses is the non-birth of the four fearlessnesses.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-birth of the four fearlessnesses is the non-cessation of the four fearlessnesses.🔽The non-cessation of the four fearlessnesses is the non-mixing of the four fearlessnesses.🔽The non-mixing of the four fearlessnesses is the non-birth of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽The non-birth of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is the non-cessation of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is the non-mixing of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽The non-mixing of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is the non-birth of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽The non-birth

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with the four detailed and thorough knowledges is the absence of connection with the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with the four detailed and thorough knowledges is the non-arising of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa gang yin @356b pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i skye ba med pa gang yin @356b pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is the non-cessation of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽byams pa chen po'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'dre ba med pa'o // byams pa chen po'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is the absence of connection with the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽The absence of connection with great love is the absence of connection with great love.

original: byams pa chen po'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with great love is the non-arising of great love.

original: byams pa chen po'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po'i 'gag pa med pa'o //🔽byams pa chen po'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po'i 'gag pa med pa'o // byams pa chen po'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of great love is the non-birth of great love.🔽The non-mixing of great love is the non-cessation of great love.

original: snying rje chen po'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of great compassion is the non-mixing of great compassion.

original: snying rje chen po'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-birth of great compassion is the non-connection of great compassion.

original: snying rje chen po'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of great compassion is the non-birth of great compassion.

original: snying rje chen po'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-mixing of great compassion is the non-cessation of great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The lack of connection of the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha is the absence of connection of the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha.🔽The absence of connection of the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha is the non-production of the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha.🔽The non-production of the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha is the non-cessation of the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba med pa'o //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos @357a *//🔽ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba med pa'o //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos @357a *//🔽ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha is the lack of connection of the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with the result of stream-entry is the absence of connection with the result of stream-entry.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with the result of stream-entry is the non-production of the result of stream-entry.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the result of stream-entry is the non-cessation of the result of stream-entry.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the result of stream-entry is the absence of connection with the result of stream-entry.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with the result of once-returning is the absence of connection with the result of once-returning.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection with the fruit of once-returning is the non-production of the fruit of once-returning.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the fruit of once-returning is the non-cessation of the fruit of once-returning.🔽The non-cessation of the fruit of once-returning is the non-confusion of the fruit of once-returning.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'brel @357b ba med pa'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'dre ba med pa'o // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'brel @357b ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-confusion of the fruit of once-returning is the non-connection with the fruit of non-returning.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection with the fruit of non-returning is the non-production of the fruit of non-returning.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of the fruit of non-returning is the non-stopping of the fruit of non-returning.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'dre ba med pa'o // dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-stopping of the fruit of non-returning is the non-mixing of the fruit of non-returning.🔽The non-mixing of the fruit of arhatship is the non-connection of the fruit of arhatship.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the fruit of arhatship is the non-arising of the fruit of arhatship.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of the fruit of arhatship is the non-stopping of the fruit of arhatship.🔽The non-stopping of the fruit of arhatship is the non-mixing of the fruit of arhatship.

original: rang byang chub kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The absence of connection with individual enlightenment is the absence of a connection with individual enlightenment.

original: rang byang chub kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of a connection with individual enlightenment is the non-arising of individual enlightenment.

original: rang byang chub kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-arising of individual enlightenment is the non-cessation of individual enlightenment.

original: rang byang chub kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //🔽lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa da ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa'o /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub kyi 'dre ba med pa'o // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa da ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa'o /
translated: The non-cessation of individual enlightenment is the absence of a connection with individual enlightenment.🔽The absence of a connection with the knowledge of path aspects is the absence of a connection with the knowledge of path aspects.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The absence of a connection with the knowledge of path aspects is the non-arising of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: @358a *// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: @358a *// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the knowledge of path aspects is the non-cessation of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-cessation of the knowledge of path aspects is the non-mixing of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-mixing of the knowledge of all aspects is the non-connection of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa'o //
translated: The non-connection of the knowledge of all aspects is the non-production of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa'o //
translated: The non-production of the knowledge of all aspects is the non-cessation of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'i //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'dre ba med pa'i //
translated: The non-cessation of the knowledge of all aspects is the non-admixture of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas /
translated: Subhūti, in that way, bodhisattva great beings who want to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: chos thams cad 'dre ba med par chos ston to ////
analyzed: chos thams cad 'dre ba med par chos ston to ////
translated: teach the Dharma without mixing up all dharmas.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya nyer gcig pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya nyer gcig pa //
translated: Volume 221

original: rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par @358b 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par @358b 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa /
translated: Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings who want to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: sems can rnams kyi dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin zhe na /
translated: become a protector for sentient beings?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: Subhuti: Here a Bodhisattva, who has stood in perfect wisdom, teaches the Dharma to beings, after he has fully known the supreme enlightenment.

original: sems can rnams la 'di ltar chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can rnams la 'di ltar chos ston te /
translated: He teaches them thus:🔽'The other shore of form is not form.

original: gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no //🔽tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no //🔽'du shes kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin no //🔽'du byed kyi pha rol gang yin pa de na 'du byed ma yin no //🔽rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no // tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no // 'du shes kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin no // 'du byed kyi pha rol gang yin pa de na 'du byed ma yin no // rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of feeling, perception, the formations and consciousness is not feeling, perception, the formations and consciousness.🔽The other shore of eye is not eye,🔽the other shore of ear, nose, tongue, body and mind is not ear, nose, tongue, body and mind.

original: mig gi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig ma yin no //🔽rna ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rna ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig ma yin no // rna ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rna ba ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of form is not form,🔽the other shore of sound, smell, taste, touch and dharmas is not sound, smell, taste, touch and dharmas.🔽The other shore of eye-contact is not eye-contact,🔽the other shore of ear-, nose-, tongue-, body-, and mind-contact is not ear-, nose-, tongue-, body-, and mind-contact.

original: sna'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni sna ma yin no //
analyzed: sna'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni sna ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the element of earth is not the element of earth,🔽the other shore of the element of water, fire, wind, space and consciousness is not the element of water, fire, wind, space and consciousness.

original: lce'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lce ma yin no //
analyzed: lce'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lce ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the realm of desire is not the realm of desire,🔽the other shore of the realm of form and the formless realm is not the realm of form and the formless realm.🔽The other shore of the world of sense desire is not the world of sense desire,🔽the other shore of the world of form and the formless world is not the world of form and the formless world.🔽The other shore of the world of sense desire is not the world of sense desire,🔽the other shore of the world of form and the formless world is not the world of form and the formless world.🔽The other shore of the world of sense desire is not the world of sense desire,🔽the other shore of the world of form and the formless world is not the world of form and the formless world.🔽The other shore of the world of sense desire is not the world of sense desire,🔽the other shore of the world of form and the formless world is not the world of form and the formless world.🔽The other shore of the world of sense desire is not the world of sense desire,🔽the other shore of the world of form and the formless world is not the world of form and the formless world.🔽The other shore of the world of

original: lus kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni lus ma yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni lus ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is beyond the body is not the body.

original: yid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de na yid ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de na yid ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is beyond the mind is not the mind.

original: gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is beyond form is not form.

original: sgra'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni sgra ma yin no //🔽dri'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni dri ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni sgra ma yin no // dri'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni dri ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is beyond sound is not sound.🔽Whatever is beyond smell is not smell.

original: ro'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni ro ma yin no //
analyzed: ro'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni ro ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is beyond taste is not taste.

original: reg gi pha rol gang yin pa de ni reg ma yin no //
analyzed: reg gi pha rol gang yin pa de ni reg ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is beyond touch is not touch.

original: chos kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni chos ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni chos ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is beyond mental phenomena is not mental phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes @359a *//🔽pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no // rna ba'i rnam par shes @359a *// pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is beyond eye consciousness is not eye consciousness.🔽Whatever is beyond ear consciousness is not ear consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is beyond nose consciousness is not nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: The other side of the tongue consciousness is not the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: The other side of the body consciousness is not the body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: The other side of the mind consciousness is not the mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
translated: The other side of eye contact is not eye contact.🔽The other side of ear contact is not ear contact.🔽The other side of nose contact is not nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
translated: The other side of tongue contact is not tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
translated: The other side of body contact is not body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
translated: The other side of the sensory contact of the mind is not the sensory contact of the mind.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
translated: The other side of the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact by means of the eye is not the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact by means of the eye.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
translated: The other side of the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact by means of the ear is not the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact by means of the ear.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang @359b yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang @359b yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
translated: The other side of the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact by means of the nose is not the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact by means of the nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
translated: The other side of the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact by means of the tongue is not the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact by means of the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the body is not the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the mind is not the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the mind.

original: sa'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin no //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the earth element is not the earth element.

original: chu'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams ma yin no //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the water element is not the water element.

original: me'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni me'i khams ma yin no //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni me'i khams ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the fire element is not the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams ma yin no //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the wind element is not the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the space element is not the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam pa shes pa'i khams ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam pa shes pa'i khams ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the consciousness element is not the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin no //
translated: The other side of ignorance is not ignorance.

original: 'du byed kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin no //
translated: The other side of volitional factors is not volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no /
translated: The other side of consciousness is not consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni ming dang gzugs ma yin no //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni ming dang gzugs ma yin no //
translated: The other side of name and form is not name and form.

original: skye mched drug gi pha rol gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin no //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi pha rol gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin no //
translated: The other side of the six sense spheres is not the six sense spheres.

original: reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni reg pa ma yin no //🔽tshor ba'i pha @360a *//
analyzed: reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni reg pa ma yin no // tshor ba'i pha @360a *//
translated: The other side of contact is not contact.

original: rol gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no //🔽sred pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni sred pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rol gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no // sred pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni sred pa ma yin no //
translated: The other side of feeling is not feeling.🔽The other side of craving is not craving.

original: len pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni len pa ma yin no //
analyzed: len pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni len pa ma yin no //
translated: The other side of appropriation is not appropriation.

original: srid pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: srid pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin no //
translated: The other side of existence is not existence.

original: skye ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni skye ba ma yin no //
analyzed: skye ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni skye ba ma yin no //
translated: The other side of birth is not birth.

original: rga shi'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rga shi ma yin no //
analyzed: rga shi'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rga shi ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of old age and death is not old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the perfection of moral discipline is not the perfection of moral discipline.🔽The other shore of the perfection of patience is not the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the perfection of perseverance is not the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the perfection of concentration is not the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of inner emptiness is not inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of outer emptiness is not outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of inner and outer emptiness is not inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of the emptiness of emptiness is not the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang @360b yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang @360b yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of great emptiness is not great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of ultimate emptiness is not ultimate emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is not the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is not the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the emptiness of what transcends limits is not the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the emptiness of the beginning and end is not the emptiness of the beginning and end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the emptiness of non-rejection is not the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the emptiness of nature is not the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The limit of emptiness of all phenomena is not the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The limit of emptiness of its own mark is not the emptiness of its own mark.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The limit of emptiness of nonapprehension is not the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The limit of emptiness of the inexistent is not the emptiness of the inexistent.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The limit of emptiness of essential nature is not the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The limit of emptiness of the inexistent essential nature is not the emptiness of the inexistent essential nature.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa @361a *//
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa @361a *//
translated: The limit of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin no //🔽yang dag par sbong ba rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin no // yang dag par sbong ba rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.🔽The other shore of the right efforts is not the right efforts.🔽The other shore of the legs of supernormal power is not the legs of supernormal power.

original: dbang po rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the faculties is not the faculties.

original: stobs rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni stobs rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni stobs rnams ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the powers is not the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the limbs of awakening is not the limbs of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the noble eightfold path is not the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no //🔽bsam gtan bzhi'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no // bsam gtan bzhi'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the four noble truths is not the four noble truths.🔽The other shore of the four concentrations is not the four concentrations.

original: tshad med pa bzhi'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the four immeasurables is not the four immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the formless absorptions is not the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the eight liberations is not the eight liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The other shore of the nine serial absorptions is not the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam @361b par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyi dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam @361b par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyi dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation is not the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of the superknowledges is not the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of the meditative stabilizations is not the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of the dhāraṇī gateways is not the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of the ten tathāgata powers is not the ten tathāgata powers.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of the four fearlessnesses is not the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of the four right discriminations is not the four right discriminations.

original: byams pa chen po'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po ma yin no //
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of great love is not great love.

original: snying rje chen po'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po ma yin no //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of great compassion is not great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha is not the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha.

original: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of the fruit of stream-enterer is not the fruit of stream-enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of the fruit of once-returner is not the fruit of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni phyir mi 'ong @362a *//🔽ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni phyir mi 'ong @362a *//🔽ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of the fruit of non-returner is not the fruit of non-returner.🔽The perfection of the fruit of perfected being is not the fruit of perfected being.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of arhatship is not arhatship.

original: rang byang chub kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub ma yin no //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is not a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of the knowledge of path aspects is not the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol tu gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol tu gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / gzugs ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzugs ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no //
translated: Subhūti, all dharmas are just like form.

original: gsol pa / gang bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no zhes bka' stsal na /
analyzed: gsol pa / gang bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no zhes bka' stsal na /
translated: “Lord, if all dharmas are just like form,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: de lta lags na ni /
analyzed: de lta lags na ni /
translated: then

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: bodhisattva great beings will have fully awakened to all dharmas.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: there are no concepts whatsoever beyond form.

original: tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no concepts whatsoever beyond feeling.

original: 'du shes kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no concepts whatsoever beyond perception.

original: 'du byed kyi pha rol tu na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi pha rol tu na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no concepts whatsoever beyond formation.

original: rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no concepts whatsoever beyond consciousness.

original: mig gi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: mig gi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no concepts whatsoever beyond the eyes.

original: rna ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽sna'i pha rol @362b na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: rna ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // sna'i pha rol @362b na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no concepts whatsoever beyond the ears.🔽There are no concepts whatsoever beyond the nose.

original: lce'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: lce'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no concepts whatsoever beyond the tongue.

original: lus kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: lus kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no concepts whatsoever beyond the body.

original: yid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: yid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no thoughts whatsoever on the other side of the mind.

original: gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no thoughts whatsoever on the other side of form.

original: sgra'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽dri'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: sgra'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // dri'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no thoughts whatsoever on the other side of sound.🔽There are no thoughts whatsoever on the other side of smell.

original: ro'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: ro'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no thoughts whatsoever on the other side of taste.

original: reg gi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: reg gi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no thoughts whatsoever on the other side of touch.

original: chos kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: chos kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no thoughts whatsoever on the other side of mental phenomena.🔽There are no thoughts whatsoever on the other side of eye consciousness.🔽There are no thoughts whatsoever on the other side of ear consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no thoughts whatsoever on the other side of nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of eye contact.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg @363a *//🔽pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // lce'i 'dus te reg @363a *// pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of nose contact.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the mind’s engagement in contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye,🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the condition of contact through the coming together of the ear,🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the condition of contact through the coming together of the nose,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the condition of contact through the coming together of the tongue,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the condition of contact through the coming together of the body,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the condition of contact through the coming together of the mind.

original: sa'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the water element.

original: me'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽rlung gi khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // rlung gi khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the fire element.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis @363b so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis @363b so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the space element.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of ignorance.

original: 'du byed kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of name and form.

original: skye mched drug gi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the six sense sources.

original: reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of contact.

original: tshor ba'i pha rol na rnams par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshor ba'i pha rol na rnams par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of feeling.

original: sred pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: sred pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of craving.

original: len pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: len pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of appropriation.

original: srid pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: srid pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of existence.

original: skye ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: skye ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of birth.

original: rga shi'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: rga shi'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the perfection of morality.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog par gang yang ma mchis @364a *//
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog par gang yang ma mchis @364a *//
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the perfection of wisdom.

original: so // nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: so // nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so; ;phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so; ;phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of outer emptiness. There are no conceptualizations on the other side of inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations whatsoever beyond the emptiness of emptiness.🔽There are no conceptualizations whatsoever beyond the emptiness of the great.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog par gang yang ma mchis so //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog par gang yang ma mchis so // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations whatsoever beyond the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽There are no conceptualizations whatsoever beyond the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations whatsoever beyond the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽There are no conceptualizations whatsoever beyond the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.
