original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations whatsoever beyond the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations whatsoever beyond the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na @364b rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na @364b rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so /
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the emptiness of non-entities.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the correct exertions.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽dbang po rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // dbang po rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the supports for miraculous ability.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the faculties.

original: stobs rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the meditative stabilizations.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang @365a *//🔽ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang @365a *// ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the eight liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so; ;ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so; ;ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the clairvoyances. There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the tathāgata powers.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //🔽byams pa chen po'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: so so yang yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so // byams pa chen po'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of great love.

original: snying rje chen po'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the result of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis @365b so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis @365b so //
translated: there are no conceptual thoughts on the other side of the result of being tied to one more rebirth.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: there are no conceptual thoughts on the other side of the result of not returning.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: there are no conceptual thoughts on the other side of the state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: there are no conceptual thoughts on the other side of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: there are no conceptual thoughts on the other side of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: there are no conceptual thoughts on the other side of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ni gzugs so //
analyzed: 'di ni gzugs so //
translated: This is form.

original: 'di ni tshor ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni tshor ba'o //
translated: This is feeling.

original: 'di ni 'du shes so //
analyzed: 'di ni 'du shes so //
translated: This is perception.

original: 'di ni 'du byed do //
analyzed: 'di ni 'du byed do //
translated: This is volitional factors.

original: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: This is consciousness.

original: 'di ni mig go /
analyzed: 'di ni mig go /
translated: This is the eyes.

original: 'di ni rna ba'o //🔽'di ni sna'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rna ba'o // 'di ni sna'o //
translated: This is the ears.🔽This is the nose.

original: 'di ni lce'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lce'o //
translated: This is the tongue.

original: 'di ni lus so //
analyzed: 'di ni lus so //
translated: This is the body.

original: 'di ni yid do //
analyzed: 'di ni yid do //
translated: This is the mind.

original: 'di ni gzugs so //
analyzed: 'di ni gzugs so //
translated: This is form.

original: 'di ni sgra'o //🔽'di ni dri'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sgra'o // 'di ni dri'o //
translated: This is sound.🔽This is smell.

original: 'di ni ro'o //
analyzed: 'di ni ro'o //
translated: This is taste.

original: 'di ni reg go /
analyzed: 'di ni reg go /
translated: This is touch.

original: 'di ni chos so //
analyzed: 'di ni chos so //
translated: This is mental objects.

original: 'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: This is eye consciousness.

original: 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //🔽'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o // 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: This is ear consciousness.🔽This is nose consciousness.

original: 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: This is tongue consciousness.

original: 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: This is body consciousness.

original: 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: This is mind consciousness.

original: 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: This is eye contact.

original: 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o // 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: This is ear contact.🔽This is nose contact.

original: 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: This is tongue contact.

original: 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: This is body contact.

original: 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: This is mind contact.

original: 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i @366a *//
analyzed: 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i @366a *//
translated: This is feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: This is feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.

original: 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: This is feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.

original: 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: This is the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the tongue.

original: 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: This is the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the body.

original: 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: This is the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the mind.

original: 'di ni sa'i khams so //
analyzed: 'di ni sa'i khams so //
translated: This is the earth element.

original: 'di ni chu'i khams so //
analyzed: 'di ni chu'i khams so //
translated: This is the water element.

original: 'di ni me'i khams so //🔽'di ni rlung gi khams so //
analyzed: 'di ni me'i khams so // 'di ni rlung gi khams so //
translated: This is the fire element.🔽This is the wind element.

original: 'di ni nam mkha'i khams so //
analyzed: 'di ni nam mkha'i khams so //
translated: This is the space element.

original: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
translated: This is the consciousness element.

original: 'di ni ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni ma rig pa'o //
translated: This is ignorance.

original: 'di ni 'du byed do //
analyzed: 'di ni 'du byed do //
translated: This is volitional action.

original: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: This is consciousness.

original: 'di ni ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: 'di ni ming dang gzugs so //
translated: This is name and form.

original: 'di ni skye mched drug go /
analyzed: 'di ni skye mched drug go /
translated: This is the six sense sources.

original: 'di ni reg pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni reg pa'o //
translated: This is contact.

original: 'di ni tshor ba'o //🔽'di ni sred pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni tshor ba'o // 'di ni sred pa'o //
translated: This is feeling.🔽This is craving.

original: 'di ni len pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni len pa'o //
translated: This is appropriation.

original: 'di ni srid pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni srid pa'o //
translated: This is existence.

original: 'di ni skye ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni skye ba'o //
translated: This is birth.

original: 'di ni rga shi'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rga shi'o //
translated: This is old age and death.

original: 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of generosity.

original: 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of discipline.

original: 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of patience.

original: 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of effort.

original: 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of concentration.

original: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽'di ni nang stong pa nyid do //🔽'di ni phyi stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do // 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the perfection of wisdom.🔽This is the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of external phenomena.🔽This is the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena.

original: 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of emptiness.

original: 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of great extent.

original: 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do //🔽'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do // 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽This is the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //🔽'di ni mtha' las 'das @366b pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do // 'di ni mtha' las 'das @366b pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽This is the emptiness of beyond extremes.

original: 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.

original: 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //🔽'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do // 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽This is the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //🔽'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do // 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of non-entities.🔽This is the emptiness of essential nature.

original: 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of essential nature of non-entities.

original: 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so //
translated: This is the applications of mindfulness.

original: 'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so //
translated: This is the right efforts.

original: 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //
translated: This is the legs of miraculous power.

original: 'di ni dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni dbang po rnams so //
translated: This is the faculties.

original: 'di ni stobs rnams so; ;'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni stobs rnams so; ;'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
translated: This is the powers. This is the limbs of awakening.

original: 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
translated: This is the noble eightfold path.

original: 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so //
translated: This is the noble truths.

original: 'di ni bsam gtan rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni bsam gtan rnams so //
translated: This is the meditative stabilizations.

original: 'di ni tshad med pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni tshad med pa rnams so //
translated: This is the immeasurables.

original: 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
translated: This is the formless absorptions.

original: 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do //
translated: This is the eight liberations.

original: 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o //
translated: These are the nine serial absorptions.

original: 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //
translated: These are the three gates of liberation: emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.

original: 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams so //
translated: These are the higher knowledges.

original: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
translated: These are the meditative stabilizations.🔽These are the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so; ;'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so; ;'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o //
translated: These are the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o //
translated: These are the four fearlessnesses.

original: 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o //🔽'di ni byams pa chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o // 'di ni byams pa chen po'o //
translated: These are the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽This is great love.

original: 'di ni snying rje @367a *//
analyzed: 'di ni snying rje @367a *//
translated: This is great compassion.

original: chen po'o // 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do //
analyzed: chen po'o // 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do //
translated: These are the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: This is the result of stream enterer.

original: 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o; ;'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o; ;'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: This is the result of once-returner. This is the result of non-returner.

original: 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid do //
translated: This is the state of a worthy one.

original: 'di ni rang byang chub bo //
analyzed: 'di ni rang byang chub bo //
translated: This is a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do //
translated: This is the knowledge of the aspects of the path.

original: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: This is the knowledge of all aspects.’

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //🔽tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do // tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever beyond form.🔽There are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever beyond feeling.

original: 'du shes kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever beyond perception.

original: 'du byed kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever beyond volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever beyond consciousness.

original: mig gi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //🔽rna ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: mig gi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do // rna ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever beyond the eyes.🔽There are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever beyond the ears.

original: sna'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: sna'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever beyond the nose.

original: lce'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: lce'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no concepts on the other side of the tongue.

original: lus kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: lus kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no concepts on the other side of the body.

original: yid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: yid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no concepts on the other side of the mind.

original: gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no concepts on the other side of sights.

original: sgra'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang @367b med do //🔽dri'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: sgra'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang @367b med do // dri'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no concepts on the other side of sounds.🔽There are no concepts on the other side of smells.

original: ro'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: ro'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no concepts on the other side of tastes.

original: reg gi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: reg gi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no concepts on the other side of tactile objects.

original: chos kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: chos kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no concepts on the other side of mental phenomena.🔽There are no concepts on the other side of eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no concepts on the other side of ear consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //🔽lce'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do // lce'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of olfactory consciousness.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of gustatory consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of tactile consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of mental consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of ear contact.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the mind’s engagement with contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the experience that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, visual forms, and visual consciousness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na @368a *//🔽rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na @368a *// rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the experience that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the ear, sounds, and auditory consciousness.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the experience that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the nose, smells, and olfactory consciousness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the experience that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the tongue, tastes, and gustatory consciousness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the experience that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the body, tactility, and tactile consciousness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the experience that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the mind, mental phenomena, and mental consciousness.

original: sa'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the water element.

original: me'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //🔽rlung gi khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do // rlung gi khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the fire element.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the space element.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of ignorance.

original: 'du byed kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of name and form.

original: skye mched drug gi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond the six sense fields.

original: reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang @368b med do //
analyzed: reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang @368b med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond contact.

original: tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond feeling.

original: sred pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: sred pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond craving.

original: len pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //🔽srid pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: len pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do // srid pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond grasping.🔽There are no conceptualizations beyond becoming.

original: skye ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: skye ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond birth.

original: rga shi'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rga shi'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond the perfection of discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do // nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the perfection of wisdom.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang @369a *//
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang @369a *//
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of emptiness of the ultimate.

original: med do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: med do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of emptiness of the conditioned.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do; ;mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do; ;mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of emptiness of what transcends limits.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the emptiness of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the emptiness of essential nature of non-entities.🔽There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do; ;yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do; ;yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the legs of miraculous power.

original: dbang po rnams @369b kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: dbang po rnams @369b kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond the faculties.

original: stobs rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond the branches of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond the truths of the noble ones.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond the meditative concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med de //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med de //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations beyond the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the higher knowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi pha rol la rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi pha rol la rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi pha rol dngo na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //🔽mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi pha @370a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi pha rol dngo na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do // mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi pha @370a *//
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the tathāgata powers.

original: rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag bar rig pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: so so yang dag bar rig pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There are no conceptualizations on the other side of the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: byams pa chen po'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: “On the other side of great love there are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever.

original: snying rje chen po'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: “On the other side of great compassion there are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: “On the other side of the distinct attributes of a buddha there are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: “On the other side of the result of stream enterer there are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: “On the other side of the result of once-returner there are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: “On the other side of the result of non-returner there are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: “On the other side of the state of a worthy one there are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever.

original: rang byang chub kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: “On the other side of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening there are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: “On the other side of the knowledge of path aspects there are no conceptual thoughts whatsoever.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: There is no conceptualization whatsoever beyond omniscience.

original: 'di ni gzugs so //
analyzed: 'di ni gzugs so //
translated: This is form.

original: 'di ni tshor ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni tshor ba'o //
translated: This is feeling.

original: 'di ni 'du shes so //
analyzed: 'di ni 'du shes so //
translated: This is perception.

original: 'di ni 'du byed do //
analyzed: 'di ni 'du byed do //
translated: This is volitional factors.

original: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: This is consciousness.

original: 'di ni mig go //
analyzed: 'di ni mig go //
translated: This is the eyes.

original: 'di ni rna ba'o //🔽'di ni sna'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rna ba'o // 'di ni sna'o //
translated: This is the ears.🔽This is the nose.

original: 'di ni lce'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lce'o //
translated: This is the tongue.

original: 'di ni lus so //
analyzed: 'di ni lus so //
translated: This is the body.

original: 'di ni yid do //
analyzed: 'di ni yid do //
translated: This is the thinking mind.

original: 'di ni gzugs so //
analyzed: 'di ni gzugs so //
translated: This is a form.

original: 'di ni sgra'o //🔽'di ni dri'o //🔽'di ni ro'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sgra'o // 'di ni dri'o // 'di ni ro'o //
translated: This is a sound.🔽This is a smell.

original: 'di ni reg go //
analyzed: 'di ni reg go //
translated: This is a taste.🔽This is a feeling.

original: 'di ni chos @370b so; ;'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni chos @370b so; ;'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: This is the eye consciousness.

original: 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //🔽'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o // 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: This is the ear consciousness.🔽This is the nose consciousness.

original: 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: This is the tongue consciousness.

original: 'di ni lus kyi rnam par pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lus kyi rnam par pa'o //
translated: This is the body consciousness.

original: 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: This is the thinking-mind consciousness.

original: 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o // 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: This is the eye contact.🔽This is the ear contact.

original: 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: This is the nose contact.

original: 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o; ;'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o; ;'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: This is the contact that is the coming together of the tongue, tastes, and the consciousness of the tongue. This is the contact that is the coming together of the body, tangibles, and the consciousness of the body.

original: 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: This is the contact that is the coming together of the mind, mental phenomena, and the consciousness of the mind.

original: 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: This is the feeling that arises from the contact that is the coming together of the eye, sights, and the consciousness of the eye.

original: 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: This is the feeling that arises from the contact that is the coming together of the ear, sounds, and the consciousness of the ear.🔽This is the feeling that arises from the contact that is the coming together of the nose, smells, and the consciousness of the nose.

original: 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: This is the feeling that arises from the contact that is the coming together of the tongue, tastes, and the consciousness of the tongue.

original: 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: This is the feeling that arises from the contact that is the coming together of the body, tangibles, and the consciousness of the body.

original: 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: This is the feeling that arises from the contact that is the coming together of the mind, mental phenomena, and the consciousness of the mind.

original: 'di ni sa'i khams so //
analyzed: 'di ni sa'i khams so //
translated: This is the earth element.

original: 'di ni chu'i khams so //
analyzed: 'di ni chu'i khams so //
translated: This is the water element.

original: 'di ni me'i khams so //🔽'di ni rlung gi khams so //
analyzed: 'di ni me'i khams so // 'di ni rlung gi khams so //
translated: This is the fire element.🔽This is the wind element.

original: 'di ni nam mkha'i khams so //
analyzed: 'di ni nam mkha'i khams so //
translated: This is the space element.

original: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
translated: This is the consciousness element.

original: 'di ni ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni ma rig pa'o //
translated: This is ignorance.

original: 'di ni 'du byed do //
analyzed: 'di ni 'du byed do //
translated: This is conditioning.

original: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: This is consciousness.

original: 'di ni ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: 'di ni ming dang gzugs so //
translated: This is name and form.

original: 'di ni skye mched drug go /
analyzed: 'di ni skye mched drug go /
translated: These are the six sense spheres.

original: 'di ni reg pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni reg pa'o //
translated: This is contact.

original: 'di ni tshor ba'o //🔽'di ni sred pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni tshor ba'o // 'di ni sred pa'o //
translated: This is feeling.🔽This is craving.

original: 'di ni len pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni len pa'o //
translated: This is appropriation.

original: 'di ni srid pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni srid pa'o //
translated: This is existence.

original: 'di ni skye ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni skye ba'o //
translated: This is birth.

original: 'di ni rga shi'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rga shi'o //
translated: This is old age and death.

original: 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of generosity.

original: 'di @371a *// ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di @371a *// ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of moral discipline.🔽This is the perfection of patience.

original: 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of perseverance.

original: 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of concentration.

original: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽'di ni nang stong pa nyid do //🔽'di ni phyi stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do // 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the perfection of wisdom.🔽This is the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of external phenomena.🔽This is the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena.

original: 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of emptiness.

original: 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of great extent.

original: 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of the uncompounded.

original: 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //🔽'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do /
analyzed: 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do // 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do /
translated: This is the emptiness of the infinite.🔽This is the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.

original: 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of nonrejection.

original: 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of all things.

original: 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //🔽'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do // 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of specific characteristics.🔽This is the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //🔽'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do // 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of nonexistence.🔽This is the emptiness of essential nature.

original: 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence.

original: 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so //
translated: This is the application of mindfulness.

original: 'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so //🔽'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so // 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //
translated: This is the right exertion.🔽This is the basis of supernatural power.

original: 'di ni dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni dbang po rnams so //
translated: This is the faculty.

original: 'di ni stobs rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni stobs rnams so //
translated: This is the power.

original: 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
translated: This is the branch of enlightenment.

original: 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
translated: This is the noble path with eight parts.

original: 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa @371b rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa @371b rnams so //
translated: These are the noble truths.

original: 'di ni bsam gtan rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni bsam gtan rnams so //
translated: These are the concentrations.

original: 'di ni tshad med pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni tshad med pa rnams so //
translated: These are the immeasurables.

original: 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
translated: These are the formless absorptions.

original: 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do //
translated: These are the eight deliverances.

original: 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
translated: These are the nine serial absorptions.

original: 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //
translated: These are the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are doors to deliverance.

original: 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams so //
translated: These are the clairvoyances.

original: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
translated: These are the meditative stabilizations.

original: 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so //
translated: These are the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so //
translated: These are the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: 'di ni mi 'jigs pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni mi 'jigs pa rnams so //
translated: These are the fearlessnesses.

original: 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so //🔽'di ni byams pa chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so // 'di ni byams pa chen po'o //
translated: These are the detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽This is the great love.

original: 'di ni snying rje chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni snying rje chen po'o //
translated: This is the great compassion.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do //
translated: These are the eighteen distinctive qualities of the buddhas.

original: 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: This is the fruit of entering the stream.

original: 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: This is the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth.

original: 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: This is the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth.

original: 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid do //
translated: This is arhatship.

original: 'di ni rang byang chub bo //
analyzed: 'di ni rang byang chub bo //
translated: This is individual enlightenment.

original: 'di ni lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid do //
translated: This is the knowledge of path aspects.

original: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do //
translated: This is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos de ltar zhi ba dag la rtog kyang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos de ltar zhi ba dag la rtog kyang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings, though they conceive of dharmas that are like that, are not cowed,

original: bdag gis chos de dag ni 'di ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis chos de dag ni 'di ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya'o //
translated: and think, ‘I will fully awaken to those dharmas in that way.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni 'di ltar mngon par rdzogs @372a *//🔽par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni 'di ltar mngon par rdzogs @372a *//🔽par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: Having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening in that way,🔽I will set rolling the unsurpassed wheel of the Dharma.

original: chos de ltar zhi ba dang de ltar bzang ba de dag bshad par bya'o snyam du sems dpa' ni dka' ba byed pa ste /
analyzed: chos de ltar zhi ba dang de ltar bzang ba de dag bshad par bya'o snyam du sems dpa' ni dka' ba byed pa ste /
translated: “I will explain that Dharma which is so peaceful and so sublime.”

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: Thus, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin no //
translated: they become the world’s protector.

original: rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: “Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings, having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: 'jig rten gyi gling du gyur pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi gling du gyur pa yin zhe na /
translated: become the world’s island?

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / chu klung ngam /
analyzed: dper na / chu klung ngam /
translated: for example,

original: chu bran nam /
analyzed: chu bran nam /
translated: in a river,🔽a small stream,🔽or a great ocean,

original: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na chus yongs su bcad pa'i gnas gang ji snyed cig /
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na chus yongs su bcad pa'i gnas gang ji snyed cig /
translated: any place that is delimited by water

original: yod pa de dag ni gling zhes bya ste /
analyzed: yod pa de dag ni gling zhes bya ste /
translated: is called an island.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Form is cut off from the past and future;🔽feeling, perception, impulse, consciousness are cut off from the past and future;

original: 'du shes ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: the eye is cut off from the past and future,🔽the ear, nose, tongue, body, mind are cut off from the past and future;

original: 'du byed ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: form is cut off from the past and future,🔽sound, smell, taste, touch, dharmas are cut off from the past and future;🔽the eye element is cut off from the past and future,

original: mig ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽rna ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: mig ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // rna ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: the form element, eye consciousness element,🔽the ear element, sound element, ear consciousness element,🔽the nose element, smell element, nose consciousness element,

original: sna ni @372b sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: sna ni @372b sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: the tongue element, taste element, tongue consciousness element,🔽the body element, touch element, body consciousness element,

original: lce ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: lce ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: the mind element, dharma element, mind consciousness element are cut off from the past and future.

original: lus ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: lus ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The body is cut off from the past and the future.

original: yid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: yid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The mind is cut off from the past and the future.

original: gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Form is cut off from the past and the future.

original: sgra ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽dri ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽ro ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // dri ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // ro ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Sound is cut off from the past and the future.🔽Smell is cut off from the past and the future.🔽Taste is cut off from the past and the future.

original: reg ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: reg ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Touch is cut off from the past and the future.

original: chos ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: chos ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Mental objects are cut off from the past and the future.🔽Eye consciousness is cut off from the past and the future.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Ear consciousness is cut off from the past and the future.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The nose consciousness is cut off from the past and the future.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The tongue consciousness is cut off from the past and the future.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The body consciousness is cut off from the past and the future.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The thinking consciousness is cut off from the past and the future.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Eye contact is cut off from the past and the future.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' @373a *//🔽yongs su chad pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' @373a *// yongs su chad pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Ear contact is cut off from the past and the future.🔽Nose contact is cut off from the past and the future.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Tongue contact is cut off from the past and the future.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Body contact is cut off from the past and the future.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Mind contact is cut off from the past and the future.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is cut off from the past and the future.🔽Feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is cut off from the past and the future.🔽Feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact is cut off from the past and the future.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact is cut off from the past and the future.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of body contact is cut off from the past and the future.
