original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Contact through mental faculty and its concomitant feeling are cut off from the past and the future.

original: sa'i khams na sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams na sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The earth element is cut off from the past and the future.

original: chu'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The water element is cut off from the past and the future.

original: me'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽rlung gi khams ni sngon gyi @373b mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: me'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // rlung gi khams ni sngon gyi @373b mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The fire element is cut off from the past and the future.🔽The wind element is cut off from the past and the future.

original: nam mkha'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // rnam par shes pa'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The space element is cut off from the past and the future.🔽The consciousness element is cut off from the past and the future.

original: ma rig pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Ignorance is cut off from the past and the future.

original: 'du byed ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Conditioning is cut off from the past and the future.

original: rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Consciousness is cut off from the past and the future.

original: ming dang gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Name-and-form is cut off from the past and the future.

original: skye mched drug ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The six sense spheres are cut off from the past and the future.

original: reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Contact is cut off from the past and the future.

original: tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽sred pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // sred pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Sensation is cut off from the past and the future.🔽Craving is cut off from the past and the future.

original: len pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: len pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Clinging is cut off from the past and the future.

original: srid pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Becoming is cut off from the past and the future.

original: skye ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Birth is the cutting off of the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: rga shi ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: rga shi ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Aging and death is the cutting off of the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The perfection of giving is the cutting off of the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' @374a *//
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' @374a *//
translated: The perfection of morality is the cutting off of the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is the cutting off of the prior limit and the posterior limit.🔽The perfection of effort is the cutting off of the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation is the cutting off of the prior limit and the posterior limit.🔽The perfection of wisdom is the cutting off of the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is cut off from a prior limit and a later limit.

original: nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Inner emptiness is cut off from a prior limit and a later limit.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Outer emptiness is cut off from a prior limit and a later limit.🔽Inner and outer emptiness is cut off from a prior limit and a later limit.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Emptiness of emptiness is cut off from a prior limit and a later limit.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // don dam pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Great emptiness is cut off from a prior limit and a later limit.🔽Ultimate emptiness is cut off from a prior limit and a later limit.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Emptiness of conditioned phenomena is cut off from a prior limit and a later limit.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is the cutting off of the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the unlimited is the cutting off of the prior limit and the posterior limit.🔽The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is the cutting off of the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-rejection is the cutting off of the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: rang bzhin @374b stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi pha ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin @374b stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi pha ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is the cutting off of the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of all things is the cutting off of the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of specific characteristics is the cutting off of the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is cut off from the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-entities is cut off from the prior limit and the posterior limit.🔽The emptiness of own-marks is cut off from the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the non-existence of own-being is cut off from the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are cut off from the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The right efforts are cut off from the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The bases of psychic power are cut off from the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: dbang po rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The faculties are cut off from the prior limit and the later limit.

original: stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The powers are cut off from the prior limit and the later limit.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The limbs of awakening are cut off from the prior limit and the later limit.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The noble eightfold path is cut off from the prior limit and the later limit.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽bsam gtan rnams @375a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // bsam gtan rnams @375a *//
translated: The truths are cut off from the prior limit and the later limit.

original: ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽tshad med pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // tshad med pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The meditative stabilizations are cut off from the prior limit and the later limit.🔽The immeasurables are cut off from the prior limit and the later limit.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The formless [absorptions] are cut off from the prior limit and the later limit.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The liberations are limited to the past and future.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The concentrations are limited to the past and future.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The doors of liberation are limited to the past and future.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The superknowledges are limited to the past and future.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The meditative absorption is limited to the past and future.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are limited to the past and future.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are limited to the past and future.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The fearlessnesses are cut off from the prior limit and the later limit.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽byams pa chen po ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // byams pa chen po ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges are cut off from the prior limit and the later limit.🔽Great love is cut off from the prior limit and the later limit.

original: snying rje chen po ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i @375b mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i @375b mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Great compassion is cut off from the prior limit and the later limit.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The distinct attributes of a buddha are cut off from the prior limit and the later limit.🔽The result of stream enterer is cut off from the prior limit and the later limit.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The result of once-returner is cut off from the prior limit and the later limit.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The fruit of non-returning is the cutting off of the prior limit and the cutting off of the later limit.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Arhatship is the cutting off of the prior limit and the cutting off of the later limit.

original: rang byang chub ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Solitary realizers’ enlightenment is the cutting off of the prior limit and the cutting off of the later limit.

original: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of path aspects is the cutting off of the prior limit and the cutting off of the later limit.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o //
translated: Omniscience is the cutting off of the prior limit and the cutting off of the later limit.

original: rab 'byor / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa 'dis chos thams cad yongs su chad pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa 'dis chos thams cad yongs su chad pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, all phenomena are cut off by this cutting off of the prior limit and the cutting off of the later limit.

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba'o //🔽de ni bzang po'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba'o // de ni bzang po'o //
translated: Subhūti, the cutting off of the prior limit and the cutting off of the later limit of all phenomena is peace,🔽it is excellent,

original: de ni yang dag pa ste /
analyzed: de ni yang dag pa ste /
translated: it is reality,

original: 'di ltar stong pa nyid dang / dmigs su med pa dang / lam gyi rgyun chad pa dang / sred pa zad pa dang / 'dre ba med pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ste /🔽rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par @376a *//🔽rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /🔽de ltar zhi ba dang / de ltar bzang po'i chos de dag ston te /
analyzed: 'di ltar stong pa nyid dang / dmigs su med pa dang / lam gyi rgyun chad pa dang / sred pa zad pa dang / 'dre ba med pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ste / rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par @376a *// rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas / de ltar zhi ba dang / de ltar bzang po'i chos de dag ston te /
translated: Thus, emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, non-performance, non-production, non-manifestation, non-obstruction, non-resolve, non-thought, and so on, up to🔽Thus, Subhūti, bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment,🔽fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.🔽Thus, they teach those peaceful, excellent dharmas.🔽🔽

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi gling du gyur pa yin no ////🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //

original: bam po nyis brgya nyer gsum pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya nyer gsum pa //
translated: Chapter 23

original: rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: “Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings, having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: 'jig rten gyi snang bar gyur pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi snang bar gyur pa yin zhe na /
translated: become a light for the world?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yun ring du ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs kyi rab rib kyis kun nas la bris shing mun pas zil gyis non pa'i sems can rnams la shes rab kyis snang bar byed cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yun ring du ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs kyi rab rib kyis kun nas la bris shing mun pas zil gyis non pa'i sems can rnams la shes rab kyis snang bar byed cing /
translated: “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, for a long time, with the light of wisdom illuminate beings whose eyes are covered by the film of the egg of ignorance and who are overcome by darkness,

original: gti mug gi mun pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun nag dang / mi shes pa'i rab rib sel te /
analyzed: gti mug gi mun pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun nag dang / mi shes pa'i rab rib sel te /
translated: and they remove the darkness of delusion, the darkness of ignorance, and the film of unknowing.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: “Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings, having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: 'jig rten gyi snang bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi snang bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: and become a light for the world.

original: rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @376b tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @376b tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: “Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings, having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: sems can rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin cing /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin cing /
translated: hold up a light for sentient beings

original: 'od 'byin pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'od 'byin pa yin zhe na /
translated: and emit light?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: mdo sde pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mdo sde pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa /
translated: teach the meaning of the sūtras endowed with the six perfections,

original: byin gyi rlabs bzhi dang ldan pa /
analyzed: byin gyi rlabs bzhi dang ldan pa /
translated: endowed with the four authorizations,

original: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang ldan pa de dag gi don ma nor bar sems can rnams la yang dag par ston te /
analyzed: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang ldan pa de dag gi don ma nor bar sems can rnams la yang dag par ston te /
translated: and endowed with the four ways of gathering, to sentient beings without error.

original: sems can rnams kyang de la yang dag par bskul zhing sbyor la /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang de la yang dag par bskul zhing sbyor la /
translated: They encourage sentient beings in that, connect them to it,

original: gzhog cing rab tu 'god de /
analyzed: gzhog cing rab tu 'god de /
translated: establish them in it, and firmly establish them in it.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: Subhuti: Thus, then, the Bodhisattva, the great being, having fully known the supreme enlightenment,

original: sems can rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin cing 'od 'byin pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin cing 'od 'byin pa yin no //
translated: holds up the light for beings, and gives them light.

original: rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: Subhuti: How does the Bodhisattva, the great being, having fully known the supreme enlightenment,

original: sems can rnams kyi ded dpon du gyur pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi ded dpon du gyur pa yin zhe na /
translated: become a leader for beings?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: Subhuti: Here the Bodhisattva, the great being, having fully known the supreme enlightenment,

original: sems can lam ngan par zhugs shing tshul ma yin pa bzhi la zhen pa rnams la sems can rnam par dag par bya ba'i don du mya ngan dang @377a *//
analyzed: sems can lam ngan par zhugs shing tshul ma yin pa bzhi la zhen pa rnams la sems can rnam par dag par bya ba'i don du mya ngan dang @377a *//
translated: For those beings who have entered the wrong path and are attached to the four wrong practices, he teaches the path of dependence on one thing in order to purify beings,

original: gnod pa las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba nub par bya ba dang / rig pa dang ldan pa'i chos go bar bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa sngon du bya ba'i phyir gcig la brten pa'i lam ston te /
analyzed: gnod pa las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba nub par bya ba dang / rig pa dang ldan pa'i chos go bar bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa sngon du bya ba'i phyir gcig la brten pa'i lam ston te /
translated: in order to transcend sorrow and harm, in order to make suffering and unhappiness disappear, in order to make them understand the Dharma of knowledge, and in order to make them go beyond suffering.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: Subhūti, in this way, having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: sems can rnams gyi ded dpon du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can rnams gyi ded dpon du gyur pa yin no //
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva becomes a leader for beings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos @383a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos @383a *//
translated: He teaches the Dharma because the strengths of the tathāgatas are non-arising and unceasing, are not defiled and are not purified.🔽He teaches the Dharma because the fearlessnesses are non-arising and unceasing, are not defiled and are not purified.

original: ston to // mi 'jigs pa rnams skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to; ;so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skye ba med pa dang /🔽'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
analyzed: ston to // mi 'jigs pa rnams skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to; ;so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
translated: He teaches the Dharma because the detailed and thorough knowledges are non-arising and unceasing, are not defiled and are not purified.🔽He teaches the Dharma because the great love is non-arising and unceasing, is not defiled and is not purified.

original: byams pa chen po skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
analyzed: byams pa chen po skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
translated: He teaches the Dharma because the great compassion is non-arising and unceasing, is not defiled and is not purified.

original: snying rje chen po skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
analyzed: snying rje chen po skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
translated: He teaches the Dharma because great compassion is non-arising and unceasing, because it is not defiled and not purified.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
translated: He teaches the Dharma because the special qualities of the Buddha are non-arising and unceasing, because they are not defiled and not purified.🔽He teaches the Dharma because the result of stream-enterer is non-arising and unceasing, because it is not defiled and not purified.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
translated: He teaches the Dharma because the result of once-returner is non-arising and unceasing, because it is not defiled and not purified.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa @383b dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa @383b dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
translated: He teaches the Dharma because the fruit of non-returning is non-arising, is non-ceasing, is non-defiled, and is non-purified.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
translated: He teaches the Dharma because the state of a worthy one is non-arising, is non-ceasing, is non-defiled, and is non-purified.
